From: Roselle Reyes <Roselle.Reyes@etoilegroup.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Ralph Joudet <Ralph.Joudet@etoilegroup.com>
BCC:

Subject: Risk management and prevention measures
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Hagop,

 

May we kindly request your usual assistance, due to increasing loss ratio, Nasco had requested confirmation regarding the risk management and prevention measures of the company to refrain losses in the future.

Is it possible to share Chalhoub’s risk management and prevention measures to align ours .

 

Thanks to let us know your thoughts.

 

Best regards,

 

Roselle Reyes 
Administration Coordinator I

 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/XVCzCnNv4U6nN99c9fPTJ7pg5?domain=etoilegroup.com> 

 

Dir: +971 4 596 9081 T: +971 4 596 9000

A: 31st Floor, Gold Tower, Cluster I, Jumeirah Lakes Towers, P.O. Box 20164, Dubai, United Arab Emirates

	
www.etoilegroup.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/XVCzCnNv4U6nN99c9fPTJ7pg5?domain=etoilegroup.com/>

Dear Roselle,

 

Unfortunately, I cannot answer you without knowing the context.

 

Which policy is this, what is the loss ratio, is it a single large claim or a series of losses that has led to the unfavourable loss ratio.

 

What are the losses that happened, were the losses due to a lack of measures taken by Etoile or was it from the mall for example?

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

This email originated outside the organization - be cautious, particularly with links or attachments.

Dear Roselle,

 

Unfortunately, I cannot answer you without knowing the context.

 

Which policy is this, what is the loss ratio, is it a single large claim or a series of losses that has led to the unfavourable loss ratio.

 

What are the losses that happened, were the losses due to a lack of measures taken by Etoile or was it from the mall for example?

 

Best Regards,

Hagop
